General.Name: Formosa Optical Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Formosa Optical Technology Co.,Ltd. operates in the optical industry in Taiwan. The company offers lenses, frames, contact lenses, potions, sunglasses, and multifocal lenses through a network of optical stores. It also engages in the trading of optometry, optics, glasses, and parts, as well as provides agency services. Formosa Optical Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.97, Xintai, 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
